basics.name: Daniel Ilies
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Full-Stack Software Engineer with a Bachelor's in Informatics and proven experience building scalable web applications and AI-driven solutions. Proficient in modern technologies including Vue.js, Next.js, Node.js, and Go, with hands-on experience in AI/ML integration and DevOps practices. Recognized for delivering impactful, award-winning projects through strong problem-solving skills and innovation.

courses: Building a modern fullstack web application (Thesis)

work.name: Trood
work.summary: Contributed to the core platform as a Full-Stack Engineering Intern, leveraging Go, Node.js, and Java to deliver production-ready features.
highlights: Delivered end-to-end production features for the Rizq Launcher MVP by writing backend logic in Go and integrating front-end components using Next.js
Engineered resilient systems by developing core services (a gRPC-based text-to-speech module and a Telegram Bot) using Go, Node.js, and Java
Resolved complex multi-codebase authorization issues including two-factor authentication management across independent codebases

work.name: BigFoot Company
work.summary: Collaborated as a core member of a small team to build the AdsMriia retargeting platform using Nuxt.js, Vue 3 (Vuetify) with Pinia, and TypeScript.
highlights: Developed the AdsMriia platform's landing page and core UI components using Nuxt.js and Vue 3 with Vuetify, leveraging Pinia for state management
Architected and implemented key dashboard and form features for user and campaign management, ensuring intuitive data visualization and input
Ensured responsive design and cross-browser compatibility to deliver a seamless experience across devices
Collaborated closely with backend developers on API design and integration to maintain smooth data flow and application functionality

work.name: DevelBox
work.summary: Led frontend development projects and engineered AI-powered solutions while collaborating with cross-functional teams.
highlights: Led a major frontend migration of an exam management platform (examene.umfst.ro/login) from Vue.js 2 to Vuetify, improving user experience and page load times by approximately 25%
Engineered and deployed "AdCognition", an AI-powered browser extension using TypeScript and a custom-trained TensorFlow.js model for real-time ad detection and blocking with over 90% accuracy
Developed "RoboGPT", a robotics application integrating NVIDIA Isaac Sim and OpenAI APIs to control robots via natural language commands, reducing manual simulation inputs by 30%
Maintained a local Linux server for training machine learning models, handling environment setup and system monitoring
Actively engaged in code reviews and collaborated with UI/UX designers to translate complex mockups into functional web pages

work.name: CGS Romania
work.summary: Provided customer support while developing innovative automation solutions.
highlights: Won 1st place in a company-wide innovation contest by developing Otis, a JavaScript-based templating software that automated form-filling and email generation, significantly improving team efficiency
Honed communication, teamwork, and problem-solving skills while interacting with customers from diverse cultures and backgrounds
Improved English language skills through daily interactions with international customers

work.name: TraineeLand
work.summary: Managed and improved WordPress sites using Elementor plugin, focusing on responsive design.
highlights: Managed multiple WordPress sites including dimitrainternational.com, traineeland.com, and eutechengineers.com
Improved overall design by adding maps, logos and ensuring responsive layouts across all devices
Enhanced site responsiveness for optimal viewing on mobile and various form-factor devices

work.name: Equal Web Design
work.summary: Developed interactive web applications and games.
highlights: Developed '21 Game,' an interactive JavaScript-based game that strengthened understanding of DOM manipulation

projects.name: IT-Hub - MERN Stack Social Media Web Application
projects.description: A full-stack social media application built with the MERN stack, demonstrating an understanding of end-to-end web development.
highlights: Designed and developed IT-Hub with a strong focus on building dynamic frontend features using React.js
Built all UI features using a component-based architecture and effectively managed application state using Redux

projects.name: Otis â€“ Customer Support Automation Tool
projects.description: An internal tool that won a company innovation award, using JavaScript, jQuery, and RegEx to automate form-filling and email generation for customer support.

projects.name: defender-bot
projects.description: A Python-controlled LEGO Mindstorms Micropython robot from university, demonstrating experience with robotics, sensors, and OOP principles.

projects.name: AdCognition
projects.description: An AI-powered browser extension for real-time ad detection and blocking with over 90% accuracy.

projects.name: RoboGPT
projects.description: An NVIDIA Isaac Sim extension for controlling robots via natural language commands using LLMs and OpenAI APIs, reducing manual simulation inputs by 30%.

awards.title: 1st Place Innovation Contest
awards.summary: Won first place for developing Otis, a JavaScript-based templating software that automated form-filling and email generation, significantly improving team efficiency
